comments.comments_text: Goal! Corentin Tolisso (Bayern Munich) displays his shooting ability and the ball sails inside the back of the net!

comments.comments_text: It's a goal! Kingsley Coman sends a long raking pass onto the head of Corentin Tolisso (Bayern Munich), who makes no mistake from close in and sends the ball low into the middle of the net. 0:1.

comments.comments_text: An amazing individual effort from Leroy Sane (Bayern Munich) ends with a strike from inside the penalty area. He sends the ball into the left side of the goal and makes it 1:5. Alexander Schwolow was helpless.
